channel.title: Comments on: Chocolate Chip Friands with Cinnamon and Almonds

item.title: By: Choclette
item.dc:creator: Choclette
item.description: I made a version of these friands today and they were absolutely delicious. Sounds like your mother was well and truly spoilt!
item.content:encoded: I made a version of these friands today and they were absolutely delicious. Sounds like your mother was well and truly spoilt!

item.title: By: sarah
item.dc:creator: sarah
item.description:
I made these yesterday and they are so yummy! I was really surprised at how big 100g of grated chocolate was though - almost a bowlful.
And friand batter is so yummy - so fudgy and chocolately and cinnamony! And because there are no egg yolks in it, i feel completely justified in eating it!
item.content:encoded:
I made these yesterday and they are so yummy! I was really surprised at how big 100g of grated chocolate was though – almost a bowlful.

And friand batter is so yummy – so fudgy and chocolately and cinnamony! And because there are no egg yolks in it, i feel completely justified in eating it!

item.title: By: Liliana
item.dc:creator: Liliana
item.description: I have heard of friands but never made them. This sounds like a great recipe and a great way to use up those left over egg whites I have when I make pastry cream. They look delicious!
item.content:encoded: I have heard of friands but never made them. This sounds like a great recipe and a great way to use up those left over egg whites I have when I make pastry cream. They look delicious!

item.title: By: Mum
item.dc:creator: Mum
item.description: Just to set the record straight, I did manage to eat one of these yummy friands even after the huge delicious butter chicken pie, trifle and poppy seed cake. Anita is a wonder cook.
item.content:encoded: Just to set the record straight, I did manage to eat one of these yummy friands even after the huge delicious butter chicken pie, trifle and poppy seed cake. Anita is a wonder cook.

item.title: By: Sikantis
item.dc:creator: Sikantis
item.description: I have to try this recipe! Sounds great!
item.content:encoded: I have to try this recipe! Sounds great!

item.title: By: Carmen
item.dc:creator: Carmen
item.description: WOW, these look truly beautiful! I love the flavor combo too - chocolate + cinnamon + almonds .. yum. :)
item.content:encoded: WOW, these look truly beautiful! I love the flavor combo too – chocolate + cinnamon + almonds .. yum. ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Y
item.dc:creator: Y
item.description: Hooray for friands! A great way to use up egg whites, though usually I'm the opposite, having too many yolks lying around unused.
item.content:encoded: Hooray for friands! A great way to use up egg whites, though usually I’m the opposite, having too many yolks lying around unused.

item.title: By: lisa (dandysugar)
item.dc:creator: lisa (dandysugar)
item.description: How sweet these are! Perfect with a cup of tea!
item.content:encoded: How sweet these are! Perfect with a cup of tea!

item.title: By: Sara
item.dc:creator: Sara
item.description: These look amazing! I have a few pounds of almonds in the house that I'm trying to use up, I definitely need to try this recipe.
item.content:encoded: These look amazing! I have a few pounds of almonds in the house that I’m trying to use up, I definitely need to try this recipe.

item.title: By: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.dc:creator: Lorraine @NotQuiteNigella
item.description: They look lovely! I've avoided making friands as I don't have a proper friand tin but baking them in a cupcake one is just as cute.
item.content:encoded: They look lovely! I’ve avoided making friands as I don’t have a proper friand tin but baking them in a cupcake one is just as cute.
